text: Busy Philipps is freaking out over being mistaken for White House Press Secretary Sarah Huckabee Sanders. On Thursday, Jon Cooper, chairman of the Democratic Coalition Against Trump, wrote on Twitter, “ Sarah Huckabee Sanders even looked habitually pissed when she was a teenager! I guess having @ GovMikeHuckabee as your dad does that to you. ” The problem is, the picture he shared was of Philipps ’ on Freaks and Geeks. In Judd Apatow and Paul Feig ’ s short - lived NBC series, the actress played Kim Kelly, the rebellious on - and - off girlfriend of Daniel Desario ( James Franco ). The mistake soon made its way onto Philipps timeline, and she quickly took notice, tweeting, “ ARE YOU F —
